title: Ethereum 2.0 Final Upgrade Complete – Network Processes 100,000 Transactions Per Second
shortdescription: The Merge Part 2 brings instant finality and zero gas fees as ETH price surges 40% overnight.
description: Network now processes 100K TPS with near-zero fees — ETH price jumps 40% as scalability breakthrough completes.
author: Emma Chen

title: Tether Launches $1 Billion Bitcoin Mining Operation – Largest Corporate Mining Venture Ever
shortdescription: USDT issuer diversifies into mining with 500MW facility, now controls 5% of global Bitcoin hash rate.
description: Tether's $1B mining venture controls 5% of global Bitcoin hash rate, marking unprecedented corporate crypto integration.
author: Emma Chen

title: Bitcoin Lightning Network Hits 1 Million Nodes – Payment Rails Now Rival Visa
shortdescription: LN capacity reaches 6,000 BTC as microtransactions become viable alternative to traditional payment networks.
description: Lightning Network reaches 1M nodes with 6,000 BTC capacity, processing millions of microtransactions daily.
author: Emma Chen

title: BlackRock Bitcoin ETF Reaches $100 Billion AUM – Largest ETF Launch in History
shortdescription: IBIT surpasses $100B in assets under management as institutional adoption reaches new heights.
description: BlackRock's IBIT becomes largest crypto ETF with $100B AUM, confirming mainstream institutional adoption.
author: Emma Chen
